content:
Hi device folks!

It was pointed out to me this morning that the Device resource does not belong to the Patient compartment, despite having an optional reference to the patient it is affixed to. Is this deliberate, or an oversight?

Ref: http://hl7.org/fhir/compartmentdefinition-patient.html
Seems like an oversight to me... @Grahame Grieve ?
probably oversight / ignorance by the initial committer (me)

And the Device compartment doesn't have Device (or Patient for that matter). Patient compartment does have DeviceRequest & DeviceUseStatement resources, interestingly enough. Since Device is owned by OO, @Hans Buitendijk ??

Which compartments for which resources?
(perhaps a discussion for me to understand better, and then I will create a task on Jira)
